church Nuestra Señora De Los Dolores Central

In 1874, when even the municipality of Puerto Berrio was considered as village "Swirl Great," the engineer Francisco Javier Cisneros, builder Ferrocarril de Antioquia, saw this port as a future railway terminal would direct connection to the city of Medellin. 1956, being the governor of Antioquia Mr. Ignacio Velez Escobar, began the construction of a bridge was given in order to join the network Eastern and Western railway in the country, this would be called "Monumental".

This type of spring is very suitable as it adapts to the conditions changing the Magdalena River, that is, if we are in rainy season the spring rises according to the amount of water that bring the affluent. and if the low spring summer allowing use throughout the year.

The Church of Our Lady of Sorrows is a Colombian Catholic Church dedicated to the Virgin Mary under the title of Sorrows and belonging to the jurisdiction Church of the Diocese of Barrancabermeja, 1 is, although located in Antioquia, It is part of the Ecclesiastical Province of Bucaramanga.
